content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position (-9.5, 8.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 8.5) - working, producing water at approximately 377 units per minute
- Boiler at position (-4.0, 8.5) - contains water and has coal fuel, generating steam
- Steam engine at position (-3.5, 13.5) - working, generating electricity
- Connected with pipes forming a water network
- Small electric pole at position (-3.5, 16.5) connecting power to other structures
- The system is now operational, producing water and converting it to steam to generate electricity
- Still experiencing connection issues between boiler and steam engine, but system is functioning

### Stone Mining Facility at position (-56.0, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Top row mining drills:
  - Electric mining drill at position (-64.5, 5.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-60.5, 5.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-56.5, 5.5)
- Bottom row mining drills:
  - Electric mining drill at position (-64.5, 9.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-60.5, 9.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-56.5, 9.5)
- Wooden chests at each drill's drop position to collect stone:
  - Chest at position (-64.5, 7.5) - contains 116 stone
  - Chest at position (-60.5, 7.5) - contains 116 stone
  - Chest at position (-56.5, 7.5) - contains 800 stone (full)
  - Chest at position (-64.5, 11.5) - contains 800 stone (full)
  - Chest at position (-60.5, 11.5) - contains 800 stone (full)
  - Chest at position (-56.5, 11.5) - contains 800 stone (full)
- Small electric poles providing power to the drills
- Transport belt network connecting the drills (partially functional)
- Currently most drills are not operating due to full chests
- When operational, produces stone at a rate of approximately 84 units per minute

### Stone Smelting Area at position (-56.0, 32.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnaces:
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 26.0) - contains 18 stone, 13 coal, producing stone bricks
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 29.0) - contains 20 stone, 7 coal, producing stone bricks
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 32.0) - contains 24 stone, 9 coal, producing stone bricks
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 35.0) - contains 20 stone, 9 coal, producing stone bricks
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 38.0) - contains 22 stone, 12 coal, producing stone bricks
- Output inserters:
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 26.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 29.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 32.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 35.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 38.5)
- Output belts:
  - Transport belt at position (-52.5, 38.5)
- Small electric poles providing power to the inserters
- All furnaces are now working with fuel and stone, producing stone bricks
- Currently producing stone bricks at a rate of approximately 4-18 units per minute (variable)

### Stone Wall Production at position (-54.5, 51.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (-54.5, 51.5) - set to produce stone walls
- Input system:
  - Wooden chest at position (-57.5, 51.5) - contains 736 stone bricks
  - Inserter at position (-56.5, 51.5) moving stone bricks from chest to assembling
